summary: The team created a draft Vision Document for the BrightHR Lite--DELME2 project based on client input, with no comments from QA, Architect, or Developer. The PM presented the draft and sought approval to proceed to the next phase.

decisions.title: Draft Vision Document formalized
decisions.details: PM Sarah created the draft based on client request, serving as starting artifact for iteration.

actions.task: Sign-off on the draft Vision Document to lock in vision
Proceed to Requirements Meeting for user stories and backlog refinement

risks.mitigation: Validate imported data from existing spreadsheets during initial setup
Focus on basic compliance features like data export and deletion in MVP
